feed.title: [BIP draft] CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY - Prevent a txout from being spent until an expiration time

entry.title: [BIP draft] CHECKLOCKTIMEVERIFY - Prevent a txout from being spent until an expiration time
entry.summary: On October 1, 2014, Gavin Andresen wrote an email suggesting to defer discussions on rolling out a new proposal until there is a consensus on whether the benefits outweigh the risks and if everyone is happy with the exact semantics. The details of deployment were left as “TBD” and the code in the repository was only meant to be illustrative. People should keep in mind that the deployment details were quite deliberate.
